Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Jackson
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing in both  directions  due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Jackson. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing in both  directions  due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Jackson. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service.

Allow extra travel time.
